name: deepcode
//: Changing display name requires change in general.ts
description: DeepCode finds bugs, security vulnerabilities, performance and API issues based on AI. DeepCode's speed of analysis allow us to analyse your code in real time and deliver results when you hit the save button in Visual Studio Code. We support Java, C/C++, JavaScript, Python, TypeScript.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Welcome to DeepCode for Visual Studio Code. üëã
Let's start by connecting VS Code with DeepCode:
[Connect VS Code with DeepCode](command:deepcode.login 'Connect with DeepCode')
üöÄ DeepCode's mission is to find bugs in your Javascript, TypeScript, Python, Java and C/C++ code, fast!
üí¨ A VS Code user (Lucas) recently said:"I'm really crazy about this super simple service that feels like it's from 5 years in the future".
üëâ Connect with DeepCode and start your first analysis!

Thanks for connecting with DeepCode. ‚úÖ
 üëâ You are almost set ü§ó, let's confirm and start the remote analysis of this workspace - feel free to check out our [terms](https://www.deepcode.ai/tc?utm_source=vsc) if you are into this.

Whoa, DeepCode is now ready to run the analysis. ‚úÖ‚ù§Ô∏èüöÄ
 The analysis should be starting and you should see issues popping up in a bit üçø
If nothing happens, feel free to hit the Rescan button below:
[Rescan](command:deepcode.start)
We will be here, let us know if you need help - we love finding bugs üòä

[Pause DeepCode for 30 minutes](command:deepcode.login)

You are currently running DeepCode in a fully automated mode. Need to take control?
[Switch to manual re-scan mode](command:deepcode.login)
Once manual re-scan mode is activated, results will not be updated unless you manully trigger the analysis.

Relaunch the analysis:
[Re-scan](command:deepcode.login)

deepcode.url.description: In order to use a self-managed DeepCode server with Bitbucket or Gitlab instance, update the instance url below:

deepcode.uploadApproved.markdownDescription: User consent for code upload to `#deepcode.url#`

deepcode.hideDCIgnore.markdownDescription: Don't show missing dcignore alert message.

deepcode.yesCrashReport.//: Name starts with y to put it at the end, as configs are sorted alphbetically
deepcode.yesCrashReport.markdownDescription: Allow crash reports to be reported to `#deepcode.url#`

deepcode.yesTelemetry.//: Name starts with y to put it at the end, as configs are sorted alphbetically
deepcode.yesTelemetry.markdownDescription: Allow extension's telemetry to be sent to `#deepcode.url#`
